name: Mercure Hotel Berlin Mitte

reviews.title: Ok hotel with good location
reviews.text: We got this hotel pretty cheap and had a good stay. The hotel isn't located in the absolute center of the city but is very close to the subway. Breakfast was plentiful and tasted good. Only downside was that our room got really hot and couldn't be cooled very easily.

reviews.title: Modern hotel in Berlin
reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights in August 2005. The hotel is located approx 200m from the railway station. It's a fairly new hotel, and the rooms are very modern, with a huge marble bathroom and very comfortable beds.

description: This 3-star hotel boasts a peaceful yet central location within walking distance of Potsdamer Platz with its famous Sony Center, casino, musical theatre and the New National Gallery. All of Berlin’s most popular attractions, such as Alexanderplatz, the Brandenburg Gate and Museum Island, can be reached from the Mercure Berlin Mitte in no time. Gleisdreieck underground station lies just 50 metres away, and provides direct access to both Alexanderplatz and the Kurfürstendamm shopping area.
